sections.title: Shopify CLI app commands
sections.sectionContent: This is the list of commands that you can use to work with Shopify apps.

sections.title: Shopify CLI general commands
sections.sectionContent: These commands are not tied to any specific surface area of Shopify.

sections.title: Shopify CLI hydrogen commands
sections.sectionContent: This is the list of commands that you can use to work with Shopify custom storefronts.

sections.title: Shopify CLI theme commands
sections.sectionContent: This is the list of commands that you can use to work with Shopify themes.
